title: Carbon Offsets Are Taking Off, but They Aren’t All Created Equal
sub_head: Projects range from restoring mangrove swamps to drawing carbon dioxide from the air with machines, but some climate experts warn against relying on offsets
body:
The business of carbon offsets is evolving fast, leaving companies to navigate a dizzying market for services that aim to cancel out greenhouse-gas emissions.
Carbon offsets remove or avoid adding greenhouse gases to the atmosphere—a process that needs to happen on a vast scale to avert disastrous climate change, according to the projections of some scientists.
